metadata.feature_description: Allows users to browse, search, and filter files including images, documents, and other file types within the portal.

steps.action: Typed 'image' in the Search Files box and pressed Enter
steps.expected: Files containing 'image' in name should be displayed
steps.actual: Search returned multiple image files including batch_image_3.png, multi_image_1.png, test_image.png, etc. Breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH IMAGE'

steps.action: Clicked on folder dropdown and selected 'Images' folder from folder tree
steps.expected: Only files in Images folder should be displayed
steps.actual: Navigated to Images folder showing image files. Breadcrumb updated to 'HOME > IMAGES'. Files displayed included Publisher subfolder, CTA-1.jpg through CTA-8.jpg, product images

steps.action: Changed sort dropdown from 'Alphabetical' to 'Last Modified'
steps.expected: Files should be sorted by modification date with most recent first
steps.actual: Sort changed to 'Last Modified' and file order updated. Folders like Templates, PermissionsTestFolder appeared first as most recently modified

steps.action: Navigated to Images folder to view image files
steps.expected: Should see only image files with thumbnails showing actual image content
steps.actual: Images folder displayed image files (.jpg, .png) with thumbnail previews showing actual image content. Files included CTA series, product images, cavalier-tv.png

steps.action: Searched for 'document' in the search box
steps.expected: Document files should be found and displayed
steps.actual: Search returned test_document.docx with DOC file icon. Breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH DOCUMENT'

steps.expected: Should be able to navigate multiple folder levels with breadcrumb trail
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to Home > Users > 003 showing '03' subfolder. Breadcrumb displayed full path. Further navigation into subfolders worked correctly

steps.action: Navigated deep into folder structure Users > 003 > 03 > 3
steps.expected: Empty folder should display appropriate message
steps.actual: Empty folder displayed 'This Folder is Empty' message with document icon and helper text 'Use the tools above to add an asset or create a folder'

steps.action: Hovered over image files to view thumbnails and action icons
steps.expected: Image thumbnails should show actual image content as preview
steps.actual: Image files displayed thumbnail previews showing actual image content (batch_image_2.png showed form dialog, cavalier-logo.png showed logo). Hover revealed action icons: edit, move, copy, download, delete

steps.action: Searched for '(special) #1' containing parentheses and hash symbol
steps.expected: Search should handle special characters and find matching files
steps.actual: Search successfully found 'test file (special) #1.txt' with special characters. Breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH (SPECIAL) #1' and 'special' was highlighted in filename

observations: File Browser API provides GetImages, GetDocuments, and GetFiles endpoints for filtering by file type, keyword, folder, and recent flag
Single-click on file cards triggers download rather than opening a preview modal - thumbnails serve as the primary preview mechanism
The UI does not have an explicit 'Images only' or 'Documents only' filter button - filtering is done via folder navigation and search
Test for 'folders containing 1000+ files' was not performed as no such folder was available in the test environment
